query:
SELECT p.id, p.orderNumber, p.rawAreaText, p.customerRef, h.name as hospitalName 
FROM purchases p 
JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospitalId = h.id 
WHERE p.rawAreaText LIKE '%Wellington Hospital%' 
AND p.areaId IS NULL 
AND p.isExcluded = false
LIMIT 10
